caption.p: Effects of A. muricata and C. trifoliatum extracts on adhesion of A. triangularis WU19001 trophozoites (A) cysts (B) on contact lens. The organism was treated with 1/2×MIC of the agents, incubated at room temperature for 24 h. Inhibitory activity was carried out using cell counting by trypan blue exclusion assay. Chlorhexidine and 1% DMSO were used as positive and negative controls, respectively. The data was presented as mean ± SD (∗significant difference; P < 0.05).
